Now we’re talking about how this is relevent for grant funding, such as the 

CLIR Recordings at Risk grant.

This is a bagit tutorial for 664-02 Programming for Cultural Heritage...

Note

This is in-progress and will be published by May 12th, 2025.myfirstbag/
